notes:
Topline figures dataset for the Nepal Earthquake crisis page.

Figures for Number of People in Need of Assistance are sourced from the UN RCO (Nepal) [situation reports](https://www.humanitarianresponse.info/en/operations/nepal/documents/document-type/situation-report/organizations/united-nations-resident-coordinators-office/organizations/united-nations-office-coordination-humanitarian-affairs).
